summary: A collector friendly player home Southeast of Ivarstead in the aspen forest of the Rift. Many features: huge armory. hot tub, teleporter, sorters, displays for collectables, stable, custom archery targets, forge, automatic horse gates, room for followers & much more.
descriptionHtml:
[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/coverpage_zpsjnofmpsn.jpg[/img]


[size=5][heading][size=6][b]Features[/b][/size][/heading][/size]
[b]
[/b]

[size=3][b]Displays for collectibles[/b][/size]: Dragon Claws, Dragon Masks, Daedric Weapons, Azura's Star, Black Star, Oghma Infinium, Thieves Guild Treasures, Black Books, Paragons, Bug Jars, Elder Scrolls.

[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/guildtreasure_zpsgj6ypwt2.jpg[/img]

[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/DLCmasks_zpsnriphvlq.jpg[/img]

[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/bugjars_zpsoyavfi1h.jpg[/img]

[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/elderscrolls_zpsoo20vytl.jpg[/img]

[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/paragons_zps3aldt7oy.jpg[/img]


[size=3][b]Bookshelves[/b][/size]- Room enough for 334 books,partially filled and decorated with statics so your shelves are never empty.

[size=3][b]Functional Potion Shelves[/b][/size]- They work like bookshelves but with potions. There are four shelves able to hold 18 potions each. Thanks to {RoC}Ficc for scripts and tutorial.

[b][size=4]Horse Stable[/size][/b]
[size=3][b]Alchemy Station [/b]
[b]Enchanting Table[/b][/size]
[b][size=4]Staff Enchanter[/size][/b]
[size=3][b]Complete Forge[/b][/size] with smelter, grindingwheel, workbench, tanning rack
[size=4][b]Cooking Pot[/b][/size] by main fireplace
[size=3][b]Guest Bedroom[/b][/size] with 4 double beds
[size=3][b]Follower Friendly[/b][/size]- navmeshed interior and exterior, interactive furniture so your followers can chill in your crib, Idle markers throughout house, armory and outside around house.


[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/HotTub_zpsu56pxtj1.jpg[/img]

[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/HotTubAngleView_zps9xyn3cix.jpg[/img]

[size=4][b]Hot Tub[/b][/size] - with waterfall that can be turned on and off. Also choose if followers take clothes off in the hot tub using lever on wall.

[size=3][b]Fast Travel Friendly[/b][/size]- Fast travel from anywhere in the house

[b][size=3]Player Home Teleporter[/size]-[/b] travel instantly to other owned players homes. Activate the Skyrim map by front door to teleport inside another player home you own(Breezehome, Honeyside, Proudspire Manor, Hjerim, VlindrelHall) *You must have the key to said home.

[size=3][b]Massive Armory[/b][/size]- 16 mannequins, 82weapon racks, 10 weapon/shield racks, 8 shield racks, 10 dagger cases, Daedric Weapon Displays, Dragon Mask Display

[size=3][b]V.I.D.S.[/b][/size] (Visual Inventory Display System)
Do you have any purple mountain flowers in stock? How about steel ingots?
Hey, are we out of smeltable dwarven scrap metal? Grand soul gems? Take a
look.

If you have at least one item in the assigned container ie(Ingot in ingot chest, empty soul gem in
empty soul gem chest etc...) you will see a static version of that item
on display. If you do not want to make your house boring and empty by
losing your static display, either leave at least one of the item in the
container, or use an UN-labeld container. There are two ordinary chests
in alchemy/ enchanting lab, and one in the forge room.

[img]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/newtarget1_zpskshkif06.jpg[/img]

[size=3][b]High Visibility Archery Targets[/b][/size]
Are you tired of shooting at ugly vanilla archery targets and not being able to see if you've even hit it? I've created two new target types to make you a happy archer.

[list][b][/b][*][b]High Visibility Swinging Targets[/b]- you can see these from a mile away. [b][/b]
[b]
[/b][*][b]High Visibility Standard Target[/b]-Brightly Colored and 4x the resolution of the original. (I plan to soon release a mod to replace all in game targets with this.)[b][/b]
[b]
[/b][*][b]*Bonus* High Visibility Practice Arrows[/b]- These arrows may border on the edge of lore friendly, but they really help with archery practice. There are 100 in the chest on the left side of the house. You can craft more at any forge.
[/list]
[size=3][b]Practice Target Toggle Switch[/b][/size]- in the backyard you can switch between dummies and standard target, and the
new swinging targets.

[size=3][b]Long, Long Range Archery Targets[/b][/size]- Can you guess what type of character I play as in Skyrim? There is a switch on the wall by the front gate that will activate/deactivate several long range targets. They can be a bit of an eyesore so they are deactivated by default.
[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/frontgatenight_zps0nnvlq2j.jpg[/img]

[size=3][b]Outdoor Lighting[/b][/size]- The porches and front gate have lanterns that turn on at 7PM and turn off at 7AM.

[size=3][b]Hearthfire[/b][/size]
I have not added any Hearthfire content at this time so you wont be able to build kids room for adoption etc...


[img]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/d06e40cd-4dc9-4fb6-a3c4-2fb19ecbe010_zpsmzxsautm.jpg[/img]
[heading][size=5][b]Location[/b][/size][/heading]
Follow the road going Southeast from Ivarstead. Take a left at the crossroads to
Riften, look up to your left there will be the house. The key is in the
mailbox to the left of the gate.
[line]
[line]
[heading][size=5][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/heading]
Objects have been placed and the Navmesh has been altered in the following cells. Any mod changing these cell coordinates could potentially conflict with this mod.


[u][b]Cells[/b][/u]
00rdrCabin                 House Interior
00rdrCabinArmory      Basement/Armory
00rdrCabinExt            Exterior 22, -20
00rdrCabinExt02        Exterior 22, -19
00rdrCabinExt03        Exterior 23, -19
00rdrCabinExt04        Exterior 23, -20
00rdrCabinExtRange   Long Range Archery Station 23, -21


[u][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/u]
Skogurheim
Requires Skyrim version 1.9.32.0 or higher, Dawngaurd and Dragonborn DLC also required.

Download the Main Skogurheim file
Extract the .esp and .bsa files to your game's Data folder

Upgrading: Remove all items from the home and armory. Remove all followers from the home. Leave area completely! To be sure you are far away enough from outdoor cells, I recommend traveling at least as far as Ivarstead. Once you have left the area make a new save. Quit skyrim and delete rDRCabin.esp and rdrCabin.bsa. Install new esp and bsa. Resume from the save point you just made.

[u][b]Load Order[/b][/u]
Keep the rdrCabin.esp late in your load order as possible for best results.

[line]

[heading][size=6]Thanks to[/size][/heading]

Ac3, Subtanker and Jet4571- naked script used for hot tub.

allegorithmic- Substance Designer used for creating normal map

Artisanix - paintings resource

Bethseda- Skyrim, Creation Kit

Blary- tagged chests, alchemy wall art, alchemy decorations, openbook resources, static booksets. These resources go a long way in improving appearance and immersion. Beautiful work Blary!

Darkrder- for Celtic paintings resource

Ethatron- DDSopt fixed my mipmap problems with custom textures

Gimp- used to make custom diffuse and normal maps


Hanaisse - Blank Road and City Signs Resource

InsanitySorrow- towels, blankets, towel rack

Leo Reynolds (flickr.com)- "coiled rope" [url=https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/#]license[/url]
This photo was modified to create the target.

Lilith - wash basin

Oaristy and Tony76 - Modders Resource Pack (forge items, Jars, Treasure, various statics)
This is a HUGE resource pack of very high quality work. I can not recommend this enough for anyone making a house mod.

PrimaFont- (1001freefonts.com) for Livingstone font on containers, sign, and cover picture

{RoC}Ficc- Repaired potion shelf scripts and wrote up a nice tutorial on Steam

[size=3]skyrimlazz[/size]-scripts are used on daedric weapons, artifacts, azuras star, black star, thieves guild treasures, and paragons.

Stoveryjm-  openbooks resource

Stroti- kitchen items

[u][size=5]And special thanks[/size][/u]

[size=4]Everyone Who Contributed to Creation Kit Wiki and Scripting References
[/size]
[size=4]Darkfox127[/size]- Tutorials for mannequins, linked chests, teleporter, and general scripting. None of the scripting would have been possible without his tutorial videos. I had no clue what scripting even was until i started watching his videos. I'm serious I really didn't know what it was. If you have any interest in learning how to script watch his videos, go to his website, check out his youtube channel. There's many great tutorial videos for creation kit and scripting on YouTube, Darkfox127 was by far the most helpful for me. He shows how to do some complicated tasks in the creation kit in very time efficient easy to follow tutorials.

If you see content that you have made or helped make and I have failed to mention you, let me know and I will update the thank you section right away.  

[line]

[center][color=#9900ff][size=4][b]Ideas?[/b][/size][/color][/center]
Have fun and let me know what you think. Are there features you really would like to see? Do you think some of these features are rubbish? Tell me and I will try to make this the best house in Tamriel.

[img=center]http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn18/RuneDasRune/fontporchangle_zpsiyl8kgal.jpg[/img]
author: RuneDasRune
